deck: Wonder Woman is kidnapped and taken to Germany where she is studied.  Steve tries to rescue her but he is also captured.  Wonder Woman escapes and then returns to Germany to free Steve.
name: The Nazi Wonder Woman

description: Ant-Man/Giant-Man, the Hulk, Iron Man, Thor and the Wasp band together to battle Graviton after he escapes from the Raft and targets Nick Fury.
name: Breakout, Part 2

deck: Diana enters a beauty contest in the hopes of finding some saboteurs and finds them in the pageant's musical director.
description: This episode introduces the distinctive changing style for Diana Prince to transform into Wonder Woman.
name: Beauty on Parade

deck: Nazis conspire against the heroes to get plans for a fighter jet and to study the material that Wonder Woman's bracelets are made from (a material called Feminum.)
description: Features the first appearance of Debra Winger as Wonder Girl.
name: Feminum Mystique Part 1

deck: The Nazis invade Paradise Island with the goal of obtaining Feminum ore.  Wonder Woman and Wonder Girl join forces to stop them.
name: The Feminum Mystique Part 2

deck: Wonder Woman battles Gargantua (an alternate version of Giganta.)
name: Wonder Woman vs. Gargantua

description:
Spider-Man is beginning to lose his special powers. To make things worse, Kingpin releases Chameleon, Mysterio, Shocker, Rhino, Scorpion, and Doctor Octopus from prison.

This issue sees the dbut of the series' version of The Sinister Six, know here as The Insidious Six.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 1: The Insidious Six

description: Spider-Man begins to turn the Insidious Six against each other. But his powers are still giving him problems.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 2: Battle of the Insidious Six

description: Mary Jane's high school ex-boyfriend, Morrie Bench, comes back into her life with new superpowers to control water. He's hoping to win Mary Jane's heart back.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 3: Hydro-Man

description:
Spider-Man seeks help from Prof. Xavier and his X-Men about the mystery behind his own mutation. Beast advises him to hear Herbert Landon's presentation for a cure on mutation. But unknown to everyone, Landon's new cure is actually meant to kill mutants instead.

This episode is a crossover of sorts with X-Men: The Animated Series.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 4: The Mutant Agenda
The Secret of the Sally Bell

description: Landon kidnaps Beast and plans to use him for his experiments. Wolverine believes that Spider-Man was involved in the kidnapping.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 5: Mutants Revenge

description: As Peter tries to find a cure for his new mutation, his fellow classmate believes it is part of Peter's assignment and is planning to steal it for himself.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 6: Morbius

description: Spider-Man ends up being chased by a man known as the Punisher when he is accused of kidnapping Michael Morbius.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 7: Enter the Punisher

description: Spider-Man has finally turned into a gigantic Man-Spider. To help him, Dr. Crawford contacts Kraven the Hunter. But will Kraven get to Man-Spider before the Punisher does?
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 8: Duel of the Hunters

description: With Man-Spider kept at bay, temporarily, Spider-Man now turns to helping Michael Morbius become human once more. But a vampire hunter named Blade is after Morbius as well.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 9: Blade the Vampire Hunter

description: Spider-Man and Blade team up to stop Morbius from turning Felicia and the rest of the city into vampires.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 10: The Immortal Vampire

description: The ancient Tablet of Time has been discovered and Dr. Conners has been assigned to study it. But Silvermane and Kingpin are both after it as well.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 11: Tablet of Time

description: Silvermane plans to use the Tablet of Time to make himself younger. He kidnaps Conners to study it before using it on himself. But Kingpin is determined to make sure that Silvermane fails.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 12: Ravages of Time

description: Adrian Toomes finances Dr. Conners new lab for neogenics. But, unknown to everyone, Toomes is actually stealing peoples' youth to have enough strength to take down Norman Osborn, as The Vulture.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 13: Shriek of the Vulture

description: The Vulture takes Spider-Man's youth to become young again, but he also absorbs the mutating DNA of Man-Spider. The Scorpion also returns, desperate to become normal again.
name: Neogenic Nightmare Chapter 14: The Final Nightmare

description: Now that Spider-Man is free from Man-Spider's curse, his new problem is finding Mary Jane, who has received a mysterious letter from her father.
name: Sins of the Fathers Chapter 1: Doctor Strange

description:
Intro:

Rupert Thorne and some of his hired muscle are chilling out in their HQ. Batman busts them, and in doing so, makes his dramatic first appearance in the show.

Rest of the episode:

Batman drives to Batcave, and the viewers (who didn`t already know) find out that he`s Bruce Wayne.

Batman, who has been active for three years, is considered an urban legend. By the large populace. The Gotham PD knows of his existence for certain, though they don`t reveal it to anyone.

In the next scene, Chief Angel Rojas assigns detective Ethan Bennet a partner. Detective ellen Yin. Their job is to capture Batman.

Then we pay our first visit to Arkham Asulym, where a mysterious patient 223 (who broke IN to the asulym) gasses an employee.

Then he releases all the inmates/patients. This makes Batman (who has been at a Gotham Gators-game) to show up. And the cop duo, because they know that Batman will show up.

The pair get to the asulym. Bridge to the island is blown up. They start to swim to it.

Batman finds the gassed employee, who has a hideous, abnormal grin on his face. then he meets the loony who did this to the poor guy. a man who calls himself Joker. They fight and talk. Then Joker scrams.

Batman does the same, and carries the man who has a rictus grin away. Bennett meets Bats, accidentally. But it`s a very brief meeting.

Back to the Batcave, where Bats finds out that the man isn`t dead. Alfred tries to cure him, but it can`t be done without a sample of the gas.

Detective Bennett pays a visit to Bruce Wayne. Does he know that Wayne has a dual identity?

Nah, Ethan and Bruce are buddies. He just wants to talk about the incident he just had.

Later on, Batman tries to find Joker, and get a sample of the gas, so an antidote can be made to counter act Jokers nefarious invention. He does find him. But Joker slips away agin. this time, in a hot air balloon. Filled with the hilarity spreading gas! And he`s going to make it burst!

Batsy goes after him, and a fight in the balloon ensues. Batman saves the citizens, beats Joker up, gets a bit of the gas, ties the villain up and flees the scene. The police protagonists make an another appearance.

The episode ends with the attacked man cured, checking that all the patients are inside their cells/rooms. Joker is. He cites a monologue that makes a slight throwback at one of his origins, and then the credits roll.
name: The Bat in the Belfry

deck: Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker arrive on Muunilinst to capture the Intergalactic Banking Clan
name: Chapter 2

deck: David Banner befriends a young boxer who saved him from a group of muggers.
name: Final Round

description: A squad of indestructible androids called the Manhunters arrives on Earth and arrests Green Lantern for interstellar atrocities and abuses of power. Part 1 of 2
name: In Blackest Night: Part 1

deck: Lelouch uses his new abilities and strategic intellect to sway the tide of a battle between Britannia and a small resistance group toward the favor of the resistance, against incredibly odds. However, mysterious white Knightmare intervenes for Britannia.
name: The White Knight Awakens

series.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

description: A squad of indestructible androids called the Manhunters arrives on Earth and arrests Green Lantern for interstellar atrocities and abuses of power. Part 2 of 2
name: In Blackest Night: Part 2

deck: Lelouch confronts his half-brother, Prince Clovis. He also discovers that one of the resistance fighters happens to go to the same school as him.
name: The False Classmate

series.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

description: When Superman convinces Aquaman, the king of Atlantis, to come to the surface world to negotiate a peace treaty on behalf of his people, Aquaman's evil half-brother, Orm, takes advantage of his king's absence to seize control of Atlantis. Part 1 of 2
name: The Enemy Below: Part 1

description:
Intro:

A meeting between three crime bosses whose operations have been vanguished by Batman takes place. They are joined by a man who is supposed to be able to beat Batman.

Rest of the episode:

Bruce is in the Batcave, working on something.

Somewhere in Gotham, a van transporting money is attacked by the mysterious criminal seen in the intro.

Suddenly the Batcomputer announces of this destructive activity. Bats gets on the scene.

The detective protagonists, Bennett and Yindell, decide to do the same.

Batman meets the man, who starts to fight against him. He`s clearly no match for Batman. Until he turns a nub in his suit, that is. Suddenly, the man grows to huge proportions, his muscles doing the same. He tells Batsy his super name, Bane, and pummels him.

After the caped crusader has been severely injured, Bane decides to leave it at that, because obviously Batman is incabable to do anything meaningful anymore. He goes away.

The detectives arrive, and Batman hides from them. When it`s safe to do so, Alfred picks Batman up.

The two police officers glamor at the Batmobile. Bruce pushes a button, and it dashes off via auto pilote. Alfred drives away. He aims to take Bruce to the hospital. When he sees loads of cops on the site, he changes his mind.

Later in the cave, Alf starts to patch Buce up.

Then there`s lashback to the day Bruces parents were killed (in it, we see a younger James Gordon). It isn`t said out loud, but is implied.

Three weeks go by, Bane has terrorized Gotham all that time, while Bruce has layed on his bed immobile, healing. He doesn`t want to, anymore. Alfred tells him that Batman needs to be no more, so Bruce Wayne can live his own life.

Bruce doesn`t think the same. He starts to work on something with what to defeat Bane. Alfred tells him that he will leave, if Bruce is too stubborn and foolish to go on with this Batman-crap. Then Alf changes his mind, and helps his adopted son to build a new play thing.

A few hours later, Bane is on it again. Yindell valiantly tries to stop him, but doesn`t last a minute. Batman intervenes in a new exo-suit (Batbot), before the villain kills Yindell. Bennett gets to the scene, and watches the battle afar, while calling an ambulance for Yindell.

There`s a brawl between the two. Bane has the upper hand.

But whattayaknow? Batman manages to beat the Mexican marauder, and Gotham is relatively safe for some time, once again.

Yindell is later seen in a hospital with Bennett. Wayne is later seen in the Batcave, looking much better now, without casts. He goes back to the streets of Gotham, and tries not to make sudden moves, because his body still aches a bit. Good for him, thinks Alfred.
name: Traction

deck: When Suzaku is framed for the murder of Prince Clovis, Lelouch takes action to save his friend and - at the same time - dons the identity of "Zero," the leader of the resistance against Britannia.
name: His Name is Zero

series.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

deck: Upon getting a job at a zoo, David Banner seeks the aid of Dr. Claudia Baxter who is studying animal aggression.
name: The Beast Within

description: When Superman convinces Aquaman, the king of Atlantis, to come to the surface world to negotiate a peace treaty on behalf of his people, Aquaman's evil half-brother, Orm, takes advantage of his king's absence to seize control of Atlantis. Part 2 of 2
name: The Enemy Below: Part 2

deck: When a model is killed, David Banner finds himself involved in a murder mystery.
name: Of Guilt, Models and Murder

description:
Batman discovers that various birds have been behind a series of burglaries and is determined to catch the criminal behind this plot.

Oswald Cobblepot attends one of Bruce Wayne's parties and misbehaves.He also steals Alfreds inherited tray.

Alfred decides to get it back. He is captured by Cobblepot (aka the Penguin) and his henchgirls, Kabuki twins. Batman has found out that Cobblepot is behind the thefts, and busts to Cobblepot manor, which is in bad shape, these days.

A tough fight ensues (in the series, Penguin is very good at martial arts). In the end, Penguin is beaten.
name: Call of the Cobblepot

description: Returning home to Themyscira, Wonder Woman finds that a powerful sorcerer named Felix Faust has turned her mother, Hippolyta, and her Amazon sisters to stone. Part 1 of 2
name: Paradise Lost: Part 1

description:
The pair of detective protagonists are chasing Bats again.

He gets away.

Detectives notice some bats. They follow them. They lead them to Wayne industries skyscraper.

They lead to Dr. Langstorm, a Wayne Industries employee is they soon think to be the Batman, for his research on bats.

In fact, Langstrom has been working on a serum that turns him into the Man-Bat.

The two bats fight against eachother. Man-bat snatches Bennett. Batman aims to save his friend.

He does this and defeats Langstrom. He`s taken to Arkham.
name: The Man Who Would Be Bat

description:
A new villain is running around in Gotham, stealing diamonds, using a freeze ray and calling himself Mister Freeze.

Batman entangles him, but Freece proves too powerful.

He tells Batman his origin story. He had been a petty criminal who Batman chased down to a cryogenic lab, where he fell in to one of the sub-zero tanks there, and was electrocuted at the same time. Batman tried to save him, of course.

Fries fell in to a deep sleep.

One day he awoke. He had become a mutant. Able to freece eveything in his path.

He had a professor construct a suit, that keeps his body temperature below zero (Because otherwise he would pass out. And eventually die.) and contains his powers, till he wants to release them.

Freece then goes away, leaving Bats encapsulated in ice. The detectives Yinn and Bennet surprise Batman. He melts the ice with a high tech gizmo, and quickly escapes via Batmobile, shivering violently.

He returns to Batcave and Alfred treats him.

Batman feels guilty, obviously. He thinks about giving up. But soon, thanks to Alfred, he overcomes theses feelings. Alfred has modified the batsuit, with what Bruce can fight back against Freece.

Who continues to terrorize Gotham, and has made an Ice palace. Batman (who has overcome his irrational guilt) fights against him there, and beats him.

An easter egg: In the flashback sequence, before he got superpowers, Fries looks at a photo of a woman who might be Nora Fries. She isn`t seen in the show in any other form.
name: The Big Chill

description:
Intro:

A mysterious woman in a cat suit brakes in to a Chinese gangsters house and attempts to steal a Jade statue. She fails, and has to run away.

Rest of the episode:

The mobster wants her dead.

This so called Catwoman wants to meet Batman, and fight him. They do. She turns out to be more than a handful when she steals his utility belt, and a remote controlled Batarang. Batsy must make sure to get the belt back before she uses it for her own purposes.

Back to the Batcave he goes, to figure this thing out. In her apartment, Selina Kyle/Catwoman is trying to unlock the belts functions. She winds up remote controlling the Batbot, without her knowledge. It goes rampant on the cave.

Batman fights against it, and is losing. Catwoman accidentally shuts it down.

Then she starts up the Batmobile, which drives away. Bruce goes after it, driving the Batcycle. He takes control of the car after a leghty chase.

He returns to Batcave, where Alfred has removed all the Bat wave receivers (a transmitting wave from the bat computer) from all the gadgets. Except one. The stolen Batarang. Bruce traces the signal back to it, to find the villainess.

She`s gone back to the Yakuza mobsters home, where she aims to steal the statue. She is surprised by the mobster, and ninjas. There`s a battle. Batman joins in, and the two workas a dynamic duo to beat the martial artists. During the fight the statue is smashed, and a mini disc is found inside of it. It contains all kind of information about the mobsters criminal activities.

Batman takes the disc (which he drops of to the police), and Catwoman scrams.

The episode ends with banter between Bruce and Alfred.
name: The Cat and the Bat

description:
Intro:

Several Gotham city tech businesses have been destroyed by arson. The arsonist is a crook named Firefly, who uses heat lazers and a highly advanced jetpack. He shows up and fights against Batman.

Rest of the episode:

Fly manages to escape.

Gothcorp (a rotten company) is trying to get the charity work that Bruces father started. They might succeed, because Bruce is regarded as a good for nothing playboy. Bruce intends to get Gotham council to change their minds about it. He`s given a chance to do so. He has to be at a meeting, 8 o` clock. Sharp.

Firefly is committing arson again, at a law firm. Doesn`t make sense, since it doesn`t fit to rest of the arsons. Bruce goes to meet him. He uses a Bat glider.

There`s a dog fight between the two. Fly wins. Batman passes out.

He wakes up the next morning. He is going to be late from the meeting.

And he is. Ten minutes. The council has made its decision. Bruce loses.

He`s bummed out.

Suddenly, he realizes something. The reason why all of Fireflys victims haven`t been tech corps, is because Gothcorp is driving them to bancrupty. By criminal means, of course. They hired Firefly to do their dirty work.

Bruce cooks up a trap. He announces that Wayne foundation is going to go public with something revolutionizing. Firefly is ordered to do what he does.

On the Wayne building, Gothams guardian is awaiting. He has a jetpack of his own now. Equal to that of Flys. Another aerial duel ensues. Batsys pack is damaged, and he drives Fly down. Then there`s a short hand-to-hand battle. Fly has no chance.

The police finds him later on, hanging from a girder.

Gothcorp faces the law now, and the charity work is given back to Wayne enterprises.
name: The Big Heat

deck: Arhur Brown, aka the Cluemaster, is set on revenge on the three people who cost him winning a TV show as a child. Batman must find a way to stop him before he takes his revenge too far.
name: Q&A

deck: While Alfred tries to set Burce up with a date, Batman must stop a plot to steal the gold reserves from the Gotham Bank. He faces Arthur Wesker, a ventriloquist, and his puppet Scarface, who has a personality of his own.
name: The Big Dummy

deck: Several people around Gotham have been turned into lifesize playing cards. A plot befitting of the Joker, except that the Joker has been safely locked away in Arkham. Batman needs great detective work to figure this one out!
name: Topsy Turvy

deck: Bruce Wayne stars in a "Day in the Life" segment for a TV show, being followed by a camera all day long. Penguin decides to stage a heist at Wayne mansion and captures Alfred. Bruce must find a way to transform into Batman and stop the Penguin, while avoiding the camera.
name: Bird of Prey

deck: Cliffhanger: The Riddler is hand cranking a vice that will crush Robin's head!
description: "WILL ROBIN ESCAPE?CAN BATMAN FIND HIM IN TIME?IS THIS THE GHASTLY END OF OUR DYNAMIC DUO?ANSWERS...TOMORROW NIGHT! SAME TIME, SAME CHANNEL!ONE HINT--THE WORST IS YET TO COME!"
name: Hi Diddle Riddle

deck: Joker has a new gadget: Joker putty, transforming anything into rubber or putty. The police hunt for Joker and Batman gets more vicious than ever before.
name: The Rubberface of Comedy

deck: In which Riddler's plot is revealed and someone dies!!
name: Smack in the Middle

description: After being exposed to Joker putty, detective Ethan Bennet turns into Clayface. He takes out his revenge on Chief Rojas and puts the whole city on alert. Batman and Detective Yin must work together to stop their former friend from going rogue.
name: The Clayface of Tragedy

deck: Cliffhanger: Bruce Wayne is trapped in a huge net and is on a conveyor belt that will dump him into a fiery furnace!
description:
"OH, THE IRONY OF IT!

THE HORROR!

THE FLAMING END OF THE CAPED CRUSADER

CAN BRUCE POSSIBLY ESCAPE??

FOR BATMAN'S SAKE! KEEP YOUR BAT FINGERS CROSSED UNTIL TOMORROW! SAME TIME! SAME CHANNEL!!"
name: Fine Feathered Finks

deck: Bruce Wayne escapes the cliffhanger deathtrap without revealing his identity. Penguin kidnaps popular actress Dawn Robbins and arranges the ransom with Batman. Batman and Robin successfully captures Penguin and rescues Miss Robbins.
name: The Penguin's A Jinx

deck: The debut of the Joker as played by the amazing Cesar Romero. Joker vows that he will beat Batman once and for all by making a Joker utility belt. Cliffhanger: Joker is about to unmask the Dynamic Duo.
description:
"COULD THIS MEAN CURTAINS??

WILL THE IDENTITIES OF OUR DYNAMIC DUO BE REVEALED TO THE WHOLE WORLD??

IS THIS THE END OF THEIR CAREER AS CRIMEFIGHTERS??

CAN THEY AVERT DISASTER??

ANSWERS... TOMORROW NIGHT! SAME TIME, SAME CHANNEL!"
name: The Joker Is Wild

deck:
Batman and Robin prevent their unmasking.
Thanks to their Universal Drug Antidote Pill, they defeat the Joker at the and of the episode.
name: Batman Is Riled

deck:
Debut of Mister Freeze as played by George Sanders.
Based on the comic book character originally known as Mr. Zero, he was given a new name and origin which is, in a past fight, Batman had accidentally spilled cryonic chemical on him during a previous arrest. This renders him incapable of living in temperatures above -50F.
Mister Freeze want revenge for this.
Cliffhanger: Batman & Robin are frozen solid.
name: Instant Freeze

deck: David Banner gets a job working in a casino whose owner is having to pay off "Uncle Jason".
name: Terror in Times Square

deck:
Batman and Robin are taken to a hospital where they are revived thanks to the Super Hypertherm De-icifier.
Mister Freeze kidnaps ace pitcher, Paul Diamante. Batman and Robin succeed in the end!
name: Rats Like Cheese

description: The Brotherhood has recently "liberated" a mutant from the MRD, and plan to deliver him to Magneto. However, their plan is quickly falling apart when they realize he's a ticking time bomb. If the X-Men can't stop them, half the mutant population will be destroyed.
name: Time Bomb

description: While the X-Men battle in the present, Professor Xavier has recently been captured in the desolate future he lives in after waking up from his coma. In a Mutant Concentration Camp, Xavier comes into contact with a mutant resistance group lead by Bishop There, they devise a plan to escape, but that's easier said then done.
name: Future X

description: After dealing with the pirates, Nightcrawler has made it to Genosha. There, Magneto and his acolytes welcome him with open arms, however, even with the charm of the Scarlet Witch beguiling him, Kurt knows this paradise has a dark secret.
name: Greetings from Genosha

description: Returning home to Themyscira, Wonder Woman finds that a powerful sorcerer named Felix Faust has turned her mother, Hippolyta, and her Amazon sisters to stone. Part 2 of 2
name: Paradise Lost: Part 2

description: When Superman is apprehended by intergalactic slave traders, he is taken to a savage planet called War World and forced to fight in endless gladiatorial games staged for the amusement of Mongul, the planet's ruthless conqueror. Part 1 of 2
name: War World: Part 1

description: When Superman is apprehended by intergalactic slave traders, he is taken to a savage planet called War World and forced to fight in endless gladiatorial games staged for the amusement of Mongul, the planet's ruthless conqueror. Part 2 of 2
name: War World: Part 2

deck: During a flight, David Banner encounters a couple of thieves trying to take some of the Ancient Egyptian artifacts on board.

description: Yu Narukamis first day in his new high school Yasogami High is overshadowed by the murder of a TV hostess on campus. Even stranger is a portal he discovers in through a TV screen, which throws both him and his new friends into a nightmare world infested by both fog and monsters.
name: You're myself, I'm yourself

description: Wolverine is haunted by his lost memories in dreams and after seeing a father and his screaming daughter in a fragment of a vision, Logan decides to act on finding out what he was in his past. With help from Emma and the others, Logan goes on a journey to find what his dream was all about, however, are some things better left undiscovered?
name: Past Directions

deck: David Banner finds himself with a problem when he discovers his boss in a casino is crooked and the people with evidence are friends of Jack McGee.
name: The Hulk Breaks Las Vegas

deck: David Banner helps a young women reclaim her rig from a group of truckers who stole it.
name: Never Give a Trucker an Even Break

deck: When David Banner signs up for DNA tests, he soon finds that the company in charge is also taking babies for tests.
name: Life and Death

description: Scott Summers aka Cyclops is still heartbroken over the lose of Jean Grey. So much so that when a cold trail leads to an old X-Men foe; Mr. Sinister, Cyclops leads a one man war against him and his minions. A war that could spark the end of Scott Summers.
name: Excessive Force

deck: ARC troopers go on splinter mission within the capital of Muunilist
name: Chapter 3

deck: On the planet Mon Calamari, Kit Fisto and his Scuba Troopers defend the Calamari council against the Quarrens.
name: Chapter 5

deck: Using forged papers, David Banner gets into a power plant to use the gamma ray equipment when an earthquake hits.
name: Earthquakes Happen

deck: Durge and his IG-Lancer droids combat Republic forces
name: Chapter 4

deck: In the murky depths of a foreboding mountain range lives a certain young boy with a tail. And, closing in on him, an intrepid young girl on a quest to collect the fabled seven "Dragon Balls" to fulfil her personal wish...
description:
Original Title: (Buruma to Son Gokuu)

Goku engages in the mundanes of his everyday life; he chops firewood, goes fishing, irking out a living among nature itself, far away from civilization. Then, out of the blue, a 'monster' hurtles towards him, and knocks him into a tree. He urges the monster to reveal itself, only what happened instead was the appearance of a feisty young girl brandishing a firearm! Meanwhile, the villainous career-villain Pilaf uncovers the one-star Dragon Ball, bringing him six steps nearer his grand ambition of world domination!
name: The Secret of the Dragon Balls

deck: In the final episode of the first season, David Banner finds himself working at a tavern.
name: The Waterfront Story

description: Robin, Aqualad and Kid Flash go on a mission of their own, only to find a startling discovery
name: Independence Day

description: Robin, Aqualad, and Kid Flash encounter Superboy and their actions capture the attention of the Justice League.
name: Fireworks

description: Reverting to his alter ego of the Green Goblin, Norman Osborn hatches a plan to poison the New York reservoir with his goblin serum to create a race of people just like him.
name: The Triumph Of The Green Goblin

description: Kraven the Hunter tries to use Firestar's power combined with a sacred ruby to regenerate a dinosaur army that he will have complete control over.
name: The Crime Of All Centuries

description: When an old man named Mr. Frump discovers an amulet on the streets of New York, he suddenly finds himself endowed with incredible powers. Doctor Doom, who has planned on using the amulet for himself, essentially manipulates Frump into doing his bidding.
name: The Fantastic Mr. Frump!

description: Shortly after Firestar meets a mutant with similar powers to her named Sunfire, the two of them team up with Iceman and Spider-Man to battle a bizzare fire creature.
name: Sunfire

description: When a meteor crashes on earth, an entity from within it takes physical form by using a swarm of bees. From there he begins using his mysterious powers to transform other innocents into bee people.
name: Swarm

description: The Spider-Friends find themselves as well as Captain America, Doctor Strange, Sub-Mariner, and Shanna the She-Devil on a mysterious island where they are being manipulated by the Chameleon. The Chameleon, possessing the ability to shape shift tricks our 7 heroes into his mansion and captures them each one by one.
name: 7 Little Superheroes

description: Electro's creation, Video Man, uses his powers to imprison Iceman and Firestar in an arcade game, and it's up to Spider-Man to free them before it's too late.
name: Video-Man
